name: Mina Goes to the Supermarket
description:
A short slice-of-life game about Mina, who makes a trip to the local supermarket.

This game was made as an attempt to learn how to use gb studio! All art, audio, writing, and code was done by me, aside from UI assets.

WARNING: the music may be very loud and/or distorted in your browser! Feel free to lower the volume or mute it if it's an inconvenience!

Please enjoy and let me know what you think! <3

Keyboard controls:

  • z to interact
